channel.title: NewDivinity 508+ [New Items, 21 Bosses, Many New Minigames, Nex] :D
channel.description:
Source, clien, cache Link: Source: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?4swdw4zodr1h98y]http://www.mediafire.com/download/v7ryt73pa5l948m/Divinity_Source.rar[/url] New Link! Client and cache: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?9e4z4939fpne393]http://www.mediafire.com/?9e4z4939fpne393[/url] cache will auto download There is little mission in client.java/client sided and server.java/server sided for leechers
Vote if i should release v2 from NewDivinity![Its Pretty Awesome] :D
[100] Downloads [150] Downloads [200] Downloads [250] Downloads [300] Downloads [350] Downloads [400] Downloads [450] Downloads
Yea this is exilium ive added shops, Better dungeoneering, More items, Random vote for reward donation system Better donator shops(not in video) Better barrows xp lamps slayer xp lamps hold more players better economy(prices was loveed up) Revenats random ep loots working jad tok haar kal minigame better xp rates you can choose difficult
NO FLAMING
NewDivinity is 508 server whit new items Owner is Divinity
Updates: -Lottery system -HighScores -Every prayer is working -veng working -New Xp interface! -::yell command -All specs are working -18 Different[Nex, Bork, Skeletal] -Minigames -Barrowns now on the ground -1 secret minigame! -Custom items and more coming -Admin and Mod places open -All Specs are working -All 24 skills are working -Custom dungeoneering -Donator zone -All specs are working -Staff zone -Overloads are working -Great Economy -Great Pking system 100% working -Many shops -Added construction[Public/Private] -Fully working trade system whit price check -100% working Duel Arena -Staking, Dice working -100% Lootshare and coinshare -100% Working clan chat -Random ep loots -Vote working
Places/Shops/Teles [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RiMruxCYa6A[/youtube]
Places/Shops/Teles [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_sR8rNo6PDA[/youtube]
Trading [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sT2gmhwqUo4[/youtube]
Duelling [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8wuUROEAzR4[/youtube]
Pking [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=daEhphvSHmM[/youtube]
Coming Soon[Read]: If You Need help just ask in this topic or if u want me to make webclient/desktop client for you just ask
Adding More text soon :PP Hope U Like IT I've hosted earlier SuomiPkers, Lummyscape and LuckySame...
